revised_title: Development of a Knowledge-Based Segmentor for Remotely Sensed Images
tldr: This article discusses the development of a knowledge-based segmentor for remotely sensed images to improve the accuracy of image interpretation and classification. The segmentor incorporates domain-dependent knowledge and information from maps and previous segmentations to create a more accurate segmentation, which can be used for various applications in environmental sciences and land use studies.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Remote Sensing
